title: Remote QuickBooks Online Bookkeeper
job_overview:
About Us:
Dynasty Accounting is a dynamic accounting firm specializing in providing comprehensive financial services to small and medium-sized businesses. We pride ourselves on our commitment to accuracy, efficiency, and personalized service tailored to our clients' needs. As we continue to expand our operations, we are seeking a dedicated and experienced QuickBooks Online Bookkeeper to join our team remotely.

*PLEASE NOTE THAT IF YOU ARE NOT AN ACCOUNTANT AND HAVE NOT WORKED WITH AN ACCOUNTING FIRM IN THE PAST, YOUR APPLICATION WILL AUTOMATICALLY BE REJECTED*


Job Description:
We are currently seeking a detail-oriented and proficient QuickBooks Online Bookkeeper to join our remote team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing the day-to-day financial transactions of our clients, ensuring accuracy, and maintaining up-to-date records using QuickBooks Online.

Responsibilities:
- Manage and reconcile bank accounts, credit cards, and other financial accounts for multiple clients.
- Process accounts payable and accounts receivable transactions accurately and efficiently.
- Prepare monthly financial reports, including profit and loss statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements.
- Demonstrate knowledge of business tax forms and the ability to accurately interpret and enter relevant financial data.
- Communicate regularly with clients to address inquiries, provide financial updates, and offer support as needed.
